data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Carenado - C90B King Air
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Special Features


  • Original EFIS (EADI and EHSI) installed.
  • Windshield rain and ice effects
  • Plugin-enhanced
  • FPS-optimized model
  • NEW! Scroll wheel support
  • DDS textures for faster load times and optimization

Features


  • Original EFIS (EADI and EHSI) installed
  • HD quality textures (2048 x 2048)
  • Custom plugin-based Avidyne display, artificial horizon and E-HSI
  • Custom stereo sounds throughout
  • Custom logic for annunciator lights
  • Pop-up window for autopilot and various E-HSI functions.In-depth and accurate fuel logic, works like the real thing, and takes failures into account
  • Smoothly animated switches and knobs, for more silky in-cabin feel
  • Amazing multi-track stereo 3D sounds, with external sounds spilling in through windows and doors
  • Very accurate flight characteristics
  • Amazing lighting effects. Interior sHDR spill lights throughout, with individual control over intensity and direction of illumination effects
  • Windshield ice and rain effects: rain drops move realistically in accordance with airspeed, get cleared by wipers, and repopulate after wipers are shut off. Ice can be cleared with de-icing options
  • Pressurization system simulated
  • Differential throttle control with functional reverse zone
  • Polarized rear cabin windows. They can be darkened by dragging handle around in semi-circle
  • Hi-quality animated pilots
  • Extremely high-res texturing (CAUTION: requires at least 1 GB of VRAM for decent performance)
  • Thumb trim system functional
  • Ice lights feature spill effect, dynamically illuminating leading edge (HDR required)
  • Dynamic instrument glass reflections
  • Prop Disc effects feature 3D holographic side view, which changes depending on prop settings
  • Engine service access doors operational via 2D "Options" pop-up window.
  • Animated passenger tables
  • Yokes can be hidden for better visibility of panel and buttons
  • Vibrating objects in cockpit, depending on engine settings
  • Realistic engine failure after over-torque for longer than 5 minutes
  • Fully articulated and animated sun visors
  • Easy to use but extremely flexible night lighting options
  • Excellent balance between ease of use and systems depth/realism (Starting with engines running makes sure your presets are all configured in such a way that there is no surprises, but starting from cold and dark does require you to follow proper procedures)
  • Animated static discharge antennas and other fine details and animations

Included in the package


  • 6 HD liveries
  • 1 HD Blank livery
  • C90B EFIS PDF
  • C90B Emergency Checklist PDF
  • C90B Normal Checklist PDF
  • C90B Performance Tables PDF
  • C90B Reference PDF
  • C90B Terrain Awareness Annunciator Control Unit PDF
  • Recommended Settings X-Plane 9 and 10 PDF

data.short_description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 660 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 660 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 660 MB available space
